text:
The following patch adds the attribute 'reallyquiet' to the <cvs> task. It is 
the same as passing -Q on the command line to cvs.

This patch also fixes a few things in the docs, like adding <code> around parts 
that should be fixed width. Also, ' is not a valid HTML entity. Also 
changed some parts where " was used instead of ". Changed for consistency.
creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com

text:
Created attachment 7977
Proposed patch for CVS task.
